verses.verse: On that day <WH3117> they read <WH7121> in the book <WH5612> of Moses <WH4872> in the audience <WH241> of the people <WH5971>; and therein was found <WH4672> written <WH3789>, that an Ammonite <WH5984> and a Moabite <WH4125> should not enter <WH935> into the assembly <WH6951> of God <WH430> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>,

And it came to pass <WH8085>, when they had heard the law <WH8451>, that they separated <WH914> from Israel <WH3478> all the mixed multitude <WH6154>.

But in all this time I was not at Jerusalem <WH3389>; for in the two <WH8147> and thirtieth <WH7970> year <WH8141> of Artaxerxes <WH783> king <WH4428> of Babylon <WH894> I went <WH935> unto the king <WH4428>: and after <WH7093> certain days <WH3117> asked I leave <WH7592> of the king <WH4428>,

And it grieved <WH3415> me sore <WH3966>: therefore I cast forth <WH7993> all the household <WH1004> stuff <WH3627> of Tobiah <WH2900> out of <WH2351> the chamber <WH3957>.

Then I commanded <WH559>, and they cleansed <WH2891> the chambers <WH3957>: and thither brought I again <WH7725> the vessels <WH3627> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>, with the meal-offerings <WH4503> and the frankincense <WH3828>.

And I perceived <WH3045> that the portions <WH4521> of the Levites <WH3881> had not been given <WH5414> them <WH3881>; so that the Levites and the singers <WH7891>, that did <WH6213> the work <WH4399>, were fled <WH1272> every one <WH376> to his field <WH7704>.

Then contended <WH7378> I with the rulers <WH5461>, and said <WH559>, Why is the house <WH1004> of God <WH430> forsaken <WH5800>? And I gathered them together <WH6908>, and set <WH5975> them in their place <WH5977>.
Then brought <WH935> all Judah <WH3063> the tithe <WH4643> of the grain <WH1715> and the new wine <WH8492> and the oil <WH3323> unto the treasuries <WH214>.

And I made treasurers <WH686> over the treasuries <WH214>, Shelemiah <WH8018> the priest <WH3548>, and Zadok <WH6659> the scribe <WH5608>, and of the Levites <WH3881>, Pedaiah <WH6305>: and next to them <WH3027> was Hanan <WH2605> the son <WH1121> of Zaccur <WH2139>, the son <WH1121> of Mattaniah <WH4983>; for they were counted <WH2803> faithful <WH539>, and their business was to distribute <WH2505> unto their brethren <WH251>.

Remember <WH2142> me <WH430>, O my God, concerning this <WH4229>, and wipe not out my good <WH2617> deeds that I have done <WH6213> for the house <WH1004> of my God <WH430>, and for the observances thereof <WH4929>.

In those days <WH3117> saw <WH7200> I in Judah <WH3063> some men treading <WH1869> wine-presses <WH1660> on the sabbath <WH7676>, and bringing in <WH935> sheaves <WH6194>, and lading <WH6006> asses <WH2543> therewith <WH3196>; as also wine, grapes <WH6025>, and figs <WH8384>, and all manner of burdens <WH4853>, which they brought <WH935> into Jerusalem <WH3389> on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>: and I testified <WH5749> against them in the day <WH3117> wherein they sold <WH4376> victuals <WH6718>.

There dwelt <WH3427> men of Tyre <WH6876> also therein <WH935>, who brought in fish <WH1709>, and all manner of wares <WH4377>, and sold <WH4376> on the sabbath <WH7676> unto the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>, and in Jerusalem <WH3389>.

Did <WH6213> not your fathers <WH1> thus <WH935>, and did not our God <WH430> bring <WH935> all this evil <WH7451> upon us <WH5892>, and upon this city? yet ye bring <WH935> more <WH3254> wrath <WH2740> upon Israel <WH3478> by profaning <WH2490> the sabbath <WH7676>.

And it came to pass that <WH8179>, when the gates of Jerusalem <WH3389> began to be dark <WH6751> before <WH6440> the sabbath <WH7676>, I commanded <WH559> that the doors <WH1817> should be shut <WH5462>, and commanded <WH559> that they should not be opened <WH6605> till after <WH310> the sabbath <WH7676>: and some of my servants <WH5288> set <WH5975> I over the gates <WH8179>, that there should no burden <WH4853> be brought in <WH935> on the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>.
So the merchants <WH7402> and sellers <WH4376> of all kind of wares <WH4465> lodged <WH3885> without <WH2351> Jerusalem <WH3389> once <WH6471> or twice <WH8147>.

Then I testified <WH5749> against them <WH559>, and said unto them <WH3885>, Why lodge ye about <WH5048> the wall <WH2346>? if ye do so again <WH8138>, I will lay <WH7971> hands <WH3027> on you <WH6256>. From that time forth came <WH935> they no more on the sabbath <WH7676>.

And I commanded <WH559> the Levites <WH3881> that they should purify <WH2891> themselves <WH935>, and that they should come and keep <WH8104> the gates <WH8179>, to sanctify <WH6942> the sabbath <WH7676> day <WH3117>. Remember <WH2142> unto me <WH430>, O my God, this also <WH2347>, and spare me according to the greatness <WH7230> of thy lovingkindness <WH2617>.
In those days <WH3117> also saw <WH7200> I the Jews <WH3064> that had married <WH3427> women <WH802> of Ashdod <WH796>, of Ammon <WH5984>, and of Moab <WH4125>:

and their children <WH1121> spake <WH1696> half <WH2677> in the speech of Ashdod <WH797>, and could <WH5234> not speak <WH1696> in the Jews <WH3066>' language, but according to the language <WH3956> of each <WH5971> people <WH5971>.

And I contended <WH7378> with them <WH7043>, and cursed them <WH5221>, and smote certain <WH582> of them <WH4803>, and plucked off their hair, and made them swear <WH7650> by God <WH430>, saying <WH5414>, Ye shall not give your daughters <WH1323> unto their sons <WH1121>, nor take <WH5375> their daughters <WH1323> for your sons <WH1121>, or for yourselves.

Did not Solomon <WH8010> king <WH4428> of Israel <WH3478> sin <WH2398> by these things <WH7227>? yet among many nations <WH1471> was there no king <WH4428> like him <WH157>, and he was beloved of his God <WH430>, and God <WH430> made <WH5414> him king <WH4428> over all Israel <WH3478>: nevertheless even him <WH1571> did foreign <WH5237> women <WH802> cause to sin <WH2398>.
Shall we then hearken <WH8085> unto you to do <WH6213> all this great <WH1419> evil <WH7451>, to trespass <WH4603> against our God <WH430> in marrying <WH3427> foreign <WH5237> women <WH802>?

And one of the sons <WH1121> of Joiada <WH3111>, the son <WH1121> of Eliashib <WH475> the high <WH1419> priest <WH3548>, was son-in <WH2860>-law to Sanballat <WH5571> the Horonite <WH2772>: therefore I chased him from me <WH1272>.
Remember <WH2142> them <WH430>, O my God, because they have defiled <WH1352> the priesthood <WH3550>, and the covenant <WH1285> of the priesthood <WH3550>, and of the Levites <WH3881>.
Thus cleansed <WH2891> I them from all foreigners <WH5236>, and appointed <WH5975> charges <WH4931> for the priests <WH3548> and for the Levites <WH3881>, every one <WH376> in his work <WH4399>;
and for the wood <WH6086> - offering <WH7133>, at times <WH6256> appointed <WH2163>, and for the first-fruits <WH1061>. Remember <WH2142> me <WH430>, O my God, for good <WH2896>.
